name: DBDNS
short_description:
A VERY simple DNS tool. Ever wanted to be able to access your PC's files at work or school? Do you have a dynamic IP at home? (it changes randomly)

Here's a simple solution:
 run this program on your windows PC at home
 have your ports forwarded in your router
 also allow the ports in your firewall
 run your http/ftp/etc..server on the pc

From any browser, just type the URL provided by my program (which can be easily emailed or texted) into ANY browser and you will see your IP!

This program DOES NOT host or serve files, nor does it provide any (sub)domain level DNS addresses, There are many programs out there to do that. DBDNS just provides you with a means to get your IP from a common webbrowser to access the servers/services you wish to install on your pc.

This program can also tell you your own public IP.

programmed in AutoHotKey_L
